Wild Rose Attunement Balancing Facial Mask

Brand: Wild Rose

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Rhassoul clay, Rosa centifolia (rose) petals*, essential oils of Lavandula angustifolia (lavender)*, Cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass)*, Daucus carota (carrot) seed, Pelargonium graveolens (geranium), Helichrysum italicum*
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
